posts.text: Democrats Are Already Looking Ahead to 2022 Midterms
The race to get Georgia’s 23,000 17-year-olds registered to vote
Michigan would be carbon-neutral by 2050 under Whitmer climate change plan
Let’s be honest: This is either about continuing to marginalize minorities or complete ignorance of current science. Neither is a good look.
Barack Obama is a wise man. He’s right.
The last thing we need is to fight amongst ourselves.
There was no pivot, no about-face. This is who Mitch McConnell has always been - a soulless, snake-licking, petty humanoid turtle.
I’m praying that we end up with two more come January, but for now, from Michigan to Arizona, thank you.
Bag Man gets more and more applicable every day.
Ladies and gentleman, that man *is a goober*.
We will certainly lose if we don’t try.

Unfortunately, the Trump administration has granted us loads of campaign fodder to utilize. We have to tie the rank-and-file GOP to Trumpism and make sure America doesn’t forget the connection. In the meantime, all I can do is pray that the GOP undergoes some kind of reformation so that they are again on the same plane of reality as the Dems are.
Different subtypes of the parties fare better in certain areas. Sometimes you have to make some adjustments to get more accomplished.

That is also true. If there’s one thing this whole debacle has taught us, it’s that history may be a guide, but it certainly isn’t an absolute prediction. After all, incumbent presidents very rarely lose in America, and yet one just did.
Exactly. That’s why I’m already planning where my donations will go after Georgia’s runoffs are over. I’ll be volunteering nice and early.
It’s gonna take a great deal of effort, especially if the Senate stays red.
